entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Englee 11:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5 except low minus 10 inland.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 5 except low minus 10 inland. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain mixed with snow near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023
